Description: While this item is equipped, you cannot equip other items of the same type (if this item is a sword you cannot equip other swords, etc.).
This surface of this item is polished to a reflective shine. While this item is equipped, your reflection does not appear on surfaces such as mirrors or water.
This item incorporates a dark metal into its construction. While this item is equipped, for each hour you spend outdoors in a thunderstorm there is a 10% chance that you will get struck by lightning.
While this item is equipped, your eyes glow a sinister red.
While this item is equipped, small beasts such as rabbits, squirrels, dogs, or cats are unnaturally frightened of you.
This item emits a foul odor that fills the space within 10 ft. of it.
The image of a terrified face is carved or inscribed upon this item. Faint screaming can be heard emanating from this item.
While this item is equipped, your shadow seems to be out of sync with your movements and you leave two sets of footprints wherever you walk.
Ominous whispers in an unknown language can be heard emanating from this item. While this item is equipped, your sleep is plagued by nightmares.
Whenever you use this item, a shock of pain courses through your body.
While this item is equipped, you require double the amount of food and water each day to prevent the effects of hunger or starvation.
Creatures that sleep within 5 ft. of this item do not have pleasant dreams, only nightmares.
Blood continuously drips from this item.
Each time this item is used roll a d20. On a roll of 1 this item explodes, dealing 2d6 fire damage to the creature using it.
The air around this item is unnaturally cold. While this item is equipped, when you look into a mirror or reflective surface, you see a shadowy figure behind you in the reflection.
When you touch this item, all of your hair harmlessly falls off of your body.
This item is a dull greyish color. While this item is equipped, all food and drink you consume tastes like ash.
While this item is equipped, all food you eat tastes bland and under seasoned.
While this item is equipped, you have the unshakeable sensation that someone is watching you.
While this item is equipped, you are convinced that everyone around you is out to get you.
When you touch this item, you cannot remove your hand from it unless you succeed on a DC 12 Strength check.
When you touch this item, make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, you are blinded for 1d10 minutes.
When you touch this item, make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, you are paralyzed for 1d4 minutes.
While this item is equipped, it glows a faint reddish color when you tell a lie.
While this item is equipped, your feet drag and your movements feel lethargic. Your walking speed is reduced by 5 ft.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Dexterity(Acrobatics) checks.
This item is made from the pelts or bones of animals. While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Wisdom(Animal Handling) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Intelligence(Arcana) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Strength(Athletics) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Charisma(Deception) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Intelligence(History) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Wisdom(Insight) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Charisma(Intimidation) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Intelligence(Investigation) checks.
This item is stained with long dried blood. While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Wisdom(Medicine) checks.
This item has a charred handprint on it. While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Intelligence(Nature) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Wisdom(Perception) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Charisma(Performance) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Charisma(Persuasion) checks.
This item has a defaced religious symbol carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Intelligence(Religion) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Dexterity(Sleight of Hand) checks.
This item seems to rattle and creak as you move. While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on Wisdom(Survival) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on checks or saving throws made to resist disease.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to slashing damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to piercing damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to bludgeoning damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to poison damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to acid damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to fire damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to cold damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to radiant damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to necrotic damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to lightning damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to thunder damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to force damage.
While this item is equipped, you are vulnerable to psychic damage.
Flowers and other small plants within 10 ft. of this item wilt and die.
While this item is equipped, you constantly find sand in your pockets, shoes, and many other places.
While this item is equipped, you can only have one foot touching the ground or floor at a time.

The name "Bob" is carved or inscribed on this item. While this item is equipped, your true name is forgotten and you can only be referred to as "Bob." Anyone who knew your true name only remembers you as "Bob."
While this item is equipped, you can only communicate through song.
This item causes chronic headaches to those that touch it. While this item is equipped, when you complete a short or long rest you take 1d4 psychic damage.
While this item is equipped, you can only communicate using haikus.
This item dissolves into nothing and is permanently destroyed if it touches any amount of water.
While this item is equipped, you can only communicate using rhyming couplets.

While this item is equipped, your shifty eyes and strange behavior give off the wrong vibe. You have disadvantage on Charisma checks made to influence teens, hip young folks, or anyone under the influence of drugs or alcohol.

This item feeds off the life force of nearby creatures. Each time you complete a short or long rest While this item is equipped, your current and maximum hit points are reduced by 1. Remove curse, greater restoration, or some kind of similar magic can restore your maximum hit points to their original value.

Each time you complete a long rest While this item is equipped, your height is reduced by 1 inch (2.5 cm). Remove curse, greater restoration, or some kind of similar magic can restore you to your original height.
This item has a skull carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on death saving throws.
This item only exists on your current plane while someone is looking at it.
While this item is equipped, illusory magic causes your hair and clothing take on the appearance of whatever was fashionable 50 years ago.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on checks made to haggle or negotiate prices.

While this item is equipped, whenever you roll hit dice to regain hit points, you halve the number rolled on each hit die (rounded down, minimum of 1) when calculating the total number of hit points regained.
While this item is equipped, you cannot attune to items other than this item. Any items that you are currently attuned to when you become attuned to this item are immediately unattuned.
While this item is equipped and you are in bright light, you have disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets within 30 ft. of you.
While this item is equipped, you have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets further than 30 ft. away from you.
This item seems to be of Elven make. While this item is equipped, you need only 4 hours of sleep to gain the effects of a long rest.
Each dawn roll a d20. On a 20, this item creates an exact duplicate of itself which appears in an empty space within 5ft. of the original.
While this item is equipped, you gain blindsight out to a range of 10 ft.
While this item is equipped, you gain tremorsense out to a range of 15 ft.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Dexterity(Acrobatics) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Animal Handling) checks.
This item is covered in arcane symbols. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Intelligence(Arcana) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Strength(Athletics) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Charisma(Deception) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Intelligence(History) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Insight) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Charisma(Intimidation) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Intelligence(Investigation) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Medicine) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Intelligence(Nature) checks.
This item has the eyes of an eagle carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Perception) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Charisma(Performance) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Charisma(Persuasion) checks.
This item has a religious symbol carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Intelligence(Religion) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Dexterity(Sleight of Hand) checks.
Nearby shadows seem to cling to this item. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Survival) checks.
While this item is equipped, your walking speed increases by 10 ft.
While this item is equipped, finishing a short rest reduces your exhaustion level by 1, provided you also ingested some food or drink.
While this item is equipped, you need only 30 minutes to gain the effects of a short rest.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to spend a number of hit dice equal to half of your total number of hit dice (rounded down). Each hit die restores your hit points as if it had been spent during a short rest.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to slashing damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to piercing damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to bludgeoning damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to poison damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to acid damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to fire damage.
This item radiates a calming warmth. While this item is equipped, you are resistant to cold damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to radiant damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to necrotic damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to lightning damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to thunder damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to force damage.
While this item is equipped, you are resistant to psychic damage.
While this item is equipped, you can breathe in both air and water.
While this item is equipped, you gain darkvision out to a range of 30 ft.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Perception) checks that rely on sight.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Perception) checks that rely on smell.

As an action, you can use this item to make yourself invisible, gaining the effects of the Invisibility spell (no concentration required) for up to one minute. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

As an action, you can use this item to create a 10 ft. sphere of silence centered on and moving with the item. For one minute, the area within the sphere is under the effect of the Silence spell (no concentration required. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

This item has a pair of wings carved or inscribed on it. As an action, you can use this item to give yourself a flying speed of 30 ft. for one minute. This item becomes weightless and flies with you for the duration as long as you are touching it. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

This item seems to made from solid stone. While this item is equipped, you can move through solid stone as if it were difficult terrain. If you end your turn still within the stone, you are expelled to the nearest unoccupied space, taking 2d6 bludgeoning damage per 5 ft. of stone you move through.

This item contains an ancient spirit. As an action, you can summon the spirit from the item to do your bidding for one hour, gaining the effects of the Unseen Servant spell. The spirit cannot move more than 60 ft. away from the item. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

This item appears to be made from still-living wood. While this item is equipped, you can use an action to touch a tree and see its recent memories. You learn the type and number of any creatures that have moved within 15 ft. of this tree in the last 24 hours.

After spending one minute performing a ritual, praying, or meditating, choose a number between 2-19. While this item is equipped, your attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 20 or the chosen number. You cannot change the chosen number again until the next dawn.
This item is sturdy and well worn. While this item is equipped, you gain a +1 bonus to your AC.
While this item is equipped, you gain a +1 bonus to your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws and you are immune to the charmed and frightened conditions.
This item has a pair of open eyes carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you cannot be put to sleep by poison or magical means.
Touching this item makes your feel brave, even in the face of immense danger. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on saves made to resist the frightened condition.
While this item is equipped, you gain a +1 bonus to your Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws and you are immune to the paralyzed and poisoned conditions.
This item grants you a portion of each of its previous owners' skill sets. While this item is equipped, you gain a +1 bonus to all skill checks.
Over the years, this item has passed through the hands of many skilled craftsmen. While this item is equipped, you gain a +1 bonus to checks made with any tool set.
This item is always caked in dirt and mud, as if it was just dug up from the ground. While this item is equipped, you gain a burrowing speed of 30 ft. and tremorsense out to a range of 60 ft.
This item is always caked in dirt and mud, as if it was just dug up from the ground. While this item is equipped, you gain a burrowing speed of 30 ft.

While this item is equipped, when another creature you can see within 30 ft. takes damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage taken by 1d12. You also take psychic damage equal to the number rolled.

This item is exceptionally light. While this item is equipped, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. This benefit works only in short bursts; you fall if you end your turn in the air and nothing else is holding you aloft.
While this item is equipped, you have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed. Additionally, you have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks made in mountainous terrain.
While this item is equipped, you are fuckin awesome. Just an absolute badass that can do anything you set your mind to (Curse: This item isn't actually magical. The awesomeness was in you all along).

This item radiates an intense but harmless heat and is immune to fire damage. While this item is equipped, you can use an action to regain 4d4+4 hit points. This feature cannot be used again until this item has rested in an open flame (such as a campfire) for at least one hour.
While this item is equipped, when you take damage that would reduce your hitpoints to 0, you can use your reaction to make one weapon attack before falling unconscious.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on death saving throws. Additionally, rolling a 1 on a death saving throw only counts as one failure, not two.

While this item is equipped, your physical features become akin to that of a bear (clawed hands, large fangs, fur, etc.). Unarmed strikes made with your hands or teeth deal slashing or piercing damage equal to 1d6 plus your Strength modifier.

While touching this item, you can perform a 1 minute ritual to transform it into a shortsword, shield, umbrella, crowbar, 10 ft. ladder, 10 ft. chain, or 50 ft. of rope. This transformation lasts 1 hour or until you use an action to touch the item and revert it to its original form.

This item once belonged to a master thief and has a +8 bonus to checks made to pick locks. While this item is equipped, you can attempt to pick a lock that you can touch without requiring thieves' tools and using the item's lockpicking bonus instead of your own. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to unleash a fearsome battle cry. Each enemy within 60 ft. that can hear you must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you until the end of your next turn. Success or failure, a creature cannot be affected by your battle cry again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, each time you roll a d20, you treat a roll of 1-5 on the die as if it were a 1 and a roll of 16-20 on the die as if it were a 20.

While this item is equipped, when a creature you can see within 30 ft. makes a death saving throw, you can use your reaction to give that creature advantage on the save. You must use this feature prior to the roll being made.
While this item is equipped, you can see through illusions out to a range of 60 ft.

While this item is equipped, after taking an action on your turn, you can use a reaction to immediately take the same action again. If you use this feature again before taking a long rest you gain a level of exhaustion for each use after the first.
While this item is equipped, you are immune to any spell or effect that would alter your form.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 acid damage.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 cold damage.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 fire damage.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 force damage.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 lightning damage.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 necrotic damage.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 poison damage.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 psychic damage.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 radiant damage.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to activate this item's aura, which remains active for 1 minute. Upon activation and again at the start of each of your turns, each creature of your choosing within 10 ft. of you takes 1d6 thunder damage.
While this item is equipped, it whispers warnings of danger to you, granting you a +1 to initiative rolls and Dexterity saving throws.
While this item is equipped, you have an exceptionally thick skull. Unarmed strikes made with your head deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 plus your Strength modifier.

Faint screams can be heard from within this item. While this item is equipped, each time you kill a creature by reducing their hit points to zero you gain temporary hit points equal to that creature's Challenge Rating (CR), rounded up.
While this item is equipped, whenever you roll hit dice to regain hit points, you double the number rolled on each hit die when calculating the total number of hit points regained.

While this item is equipped, when you take acid damage, you can use your reaction to negate the acid damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering acid damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when you take cold damage, you can use your reaction to negate the cold damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering cold damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when you take fire damage, you can use your reaction to negate the fire damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering fire damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when you take force damage, you can use your reaction to negate the force damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering force damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when you take lightning damage, you can use your reaction to negate the lightning damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering lightning damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when you take necrotic damage, you can use your reaction to negate the necrotic damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering necrotic damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when you take poison damage, you can use your reaction to negate the poison damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering poison damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when you take psychic damage, you can use your reaction to negate the psychic damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering psychic damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when you take radiant damage, you can use your reaction to negate the radiant damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering radiant damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when you take thunder damage, you can use your reaction to negate the thunder damage and gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering thunder damage. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, if damage would reduce you to 0 hit points, your hit points are immediately restored to their maximum value instead. Once this feature has been used, this item is permanently destroyed.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to summon a fire elemental in an unoccupied space within 30 ft. of you. The elemental obeys your verbal commands for one hour. Once this feature has been used, this item turns into ash and is permanently destroyed.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to summon a water elemental in an unoccupied space within 30 ft. of you. The elemental obeys your verbal commands for one hour. Once this feature has been used, this item turns into water and is permanently destroyed.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to summon an air elemental in an unoccupied space within 30 ft. of you. The elemental obeys your verbal commands for one hour. Once this feature has been used, this item turns into wind and is permanently destroyed.

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to summon an earth elemental in an unoccupied space within 30 ft. of you. The elemental obeys your verbal commands for one hour. Once this feature has been used, this item turns into dirt and is permanently destroyed.

This form or appearance of this item cannot be altered. While this item is equipped, you are immune to any spell, curse, or effect that would alter your form, age, maximum hit points, or ability scores.
While this item is equipped, you regain 1 hit point every 5 minutes (12 hit points per hour), up to your hit point maximum.

This item radiates an aura of intense power. While this item is equipped, you can use an action to absorb this item's power, permanently destroying the item and doubling all of your ability scores for one minute. After one minute you gain one level of exhaustion.
While this item is equipped, when you are hit by an attack, you can use a reaction to add +2 to your AC.
While this item is equipped, you can use an action to teleport to an unoccupied space you can see within 60 ft. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, your skin is covered in hardened scales. While you aren't wearing armor, your AC equals 12 + your dexterity modifier.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that has fewer than half its hit points.
While this item is equipped, as a bonus action, you can move up half your speed toward a hostile creature that you can see.
While this item is equipped, when you hit with a melee weapon attack, your weapon deals one extra die of its damage.
While this item is equipped, when you grapple a creature, that creature is also restrained until they break free of the grapple.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 ft of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
While this item is equipped, you cannot be frightened while you can see or hear an allied creature within 30 feet of you.
While this item is equipped, you are immune to any effect that would sense your emotions or read your thoughts, as well as all divination spells.

While this item is equipped, if you have even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in your possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, this item points towards the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of you.
Shadows seem to cling to this item. While this item is equipped and you are in dim light or darkness, you can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

As an action, you can pay a blood toll to this item, exchanging a portion of your current hit points for a boon. For every 5 hit points given to this item, you gain a +1 bonus on your next attack (bonus applies to the damage roll as well), ability check, or saving throw, up to a maximum of +5.
While this item is equipped, you can see clearly through even the thickest fog, smoke, or mist.
While this item is equipped, you can understand and be understood by wolves and dogs.
This item is an impossibly dark shade of black. While this item is equipped, any open flame no larger than a torch within 10 ft. of you is extinguished.
This item feels lighter than you expect. While this item is equipped, you do not leave footprints.
This item is painted with vibrant colors. While this item is equipped, you are an expert juggler.
This item has images of birds painted on it. While this item is equipped, you can perfectly mimic the voice of any creature you've heard within the last 24 hours.
While this item is equipped, you can magically pull a real playing card of your choice from your sleeve at will. Any other cards you've created in this manner disappear once you create a new card.
This item cannot leave the plane of existence on which it was made.
This item cannot be damaged or destroyed by non-magical means.
This item is sturdy and well worn. While this item is equipped, you always know the direction of the nearest inn or tavern.
While this item is equipped and you are underground, you know the direction of the nearest path to the surface, if any such path exists.
While this item is equipped, you cannot become intoxicated from ingesting alcohol.
While this item is equipped, you do not suffer any of the effects of a hangover after a night of drinking. This does not prevent you from becoming intoxicated from drinking alcohol.
While this item is equipped, you know the amount of currency carried by any creature that you can see within 10 feet of you.
While this item is equipped, you can choose to make your voice carry up to 500 ft.
A bright light shines from this item, shedding bright light for 20 feet and dim light for an additional 20 feet.
While this item is equipped, you can magically change the flavor of food and beverages that you prepare.
While this item is equipped, you have an encyclopedic knowledge of a subject chosen by your GM (astronomy, baking, botany, sailing, etc.).
Outside forces cannot tamper with your dreams while you sleep within 5 ft. of this item.
While this item is equipped, you can use an action to predict what the weather will be like in your location for the next 12 hours.

This item has elements of a meteorite incorporated into its construction. While this item is equipped, you can use an action to determine the direction of the nearest meteorite (excluding this item) within 1,000 ft.
As an action, you can use this item to extinguish a non-magical flame no larger than a campfire within 15 ft. of you.
As an action, you can use this item to create up to 5 pints of ale, 5 cups of wine, or 5 shots of whiskey. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
This item has a hidden compartment filled with nuts, dried fruit, or some other kind of snack. If the compartment is empty, it is magically refilled with more small snacks the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, an invisible force diverts falling rain before it hits you, as if it were an invisible umbrella.
This item is well worn and smells faintly of fish. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to catch fish or other sea creatures.
While this item is equipped, you gain proficiency in one instrument of the GM's choice.
As an action, you can use this item to determine the direction of the nearest piece of art, jewel, or collection of currency worth 500 gp or more within 1000 ft. of you.

This item bears the cracked or defaced symbol of an ancient kingdom. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Intelligence(History) checks made to recall lore about ancient kingdoms or civilizations.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Animal Handling) checks made to interact with dogs or other canines and disadvantage on Wisdom(Animal Handling) checks to interact with cats.

While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Animal Handling) checks made to interact with cats and disadvantage on Wisdom(Animal Handling) checks made to interact with dogs or other canines.
This item appears to be slightly larger than it actually is. While this item is equipped, illusory magic causes you appear to be 1d6 inches taller.
This item appears to be slightly smaller than it actually is. While this item is equipped, illusory magic causes you appear to be 1d6 inches shorter.
While this item is equipped, illusory magic causes your facial features to appear more elvish, including pointed ears.
While this item is equipped, illusory magic causes your facial features to appear more orcish, including tusks.
While this item is equipped, illusory magic causes your facial features to appear more dwarvish, including a magnificent beard.
While this item is equipped, illusory magic causes your facial features to appear more human, including rounded ears.
While this item is equipped, illusory magic causes your facial features to appear more draconic (like a dragonborn), including scales.
While this item is equipped, illusory magic causes your facial features to appear more demonic (like a tiefling), including horns.
This item is covered in intricate carvings of flowers and vines. It glows faintly when it is within 100 ft. of a portal to the Feywild, shedding dim, greenish light for 5 ft.
This item is a dull grey, as if all its color had been drained. It glows faintly when it is within 100 ft. of a portal to Shadowfell, shedding dim light for 5 ft.
While this item is equipped, you always know the direction of the nearest craft brewery.

This item is made entirely of harmless flames. Despite its strange construction, the item is solid to the touch and functions like a normal item. It glows faintly when it is within 100 ft. of a portal to the elemental plane of fire, shedding dim light for 5 ft.

This item is made entirely of solid rock. Despite its strange construction, the item is surprisingly light and functions like a normal item. It glows faintly when it is within 100 ft. of a portal to the elemental plane of earth, shedding dim light for 5 ft.

This item is made entirely of swirling air and clouds. Despite its strange construction, the item is solid to the touch and functions like a normal item. It glows faintly when it is within 100 ft. of a portal to the elemental plane of air, shedding dim light for 5 ft.

This item is made entirely of water. Despite its strange construction, the item is solid to the touch and functions like a normal item. It glows faintly when it is within 100 ft. of a portal to the elemental plane of water, shedding dim light for 5 ft.
This item is paired with another identical item. While this item is equipped, you always know the direction of the other item in the pair.
This item is made from an old, dark wood. While this item is equipped, you know the direction of the oldest tree within 10 miles of you.
This item is light and well balanced. While this item is equipped, you take no damage from falling 30 ft. or less.
While this item is equipped, you have a lovely singing voice.
While this item is equipped, you have a +1 bonus to all skill checks made during thunderstorms.
While this item is equipped, you have a +1 bonus to all skill checks made while it is snowing.
While this item is equipped, you are overcome by a feeling of melancholy.
Each dawn, this item changes color based on the weather patterns of the upcoming day. Blue for foul/stormy, grey for overcast/neutral, or orange for fair/clear.
While this item is equipped, people tend to view you as a chill dude and a real bro. You have advantage on checks made to interact or blend in with bros, lads, or chill dudes.

While this item is equipped, you can extinguish an open flame you can see within 15 ft. by using your action to make a successful Charisma(Persuasion) or Charisma(Intimidation) check. The DC is 10 for a tiny fire and goes up by 3 for each size category greater than tiny (DC 13 for small, DC 16 for medium, etc.).

While touching this item, you can use an action to speak the name of one creature. If that creature is alive and on the same plane of existence as you the item briefly glows with a faint blue light. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
This item is covered in barnacles and sea shells. While this item is equipped, you can understand and be understood by fish and other aquatic beasts.

This item has several small, foldable tools incorporated into its construction. As a bonus action, you can unfold or fold one of the following tools: fork, knife, spoon, screwdriver, small file, small scissors, corkscrew, or bottle opener.
This item was created by a powerful dragon and is infused with some of its power. This item is made from shed dragon scales and talons and grows slightly warm when within 120 ft. of a dragon.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to haggle or negotiate prices.
While this item is equipped, your carrying capacity is doubled.

This item is camouflaged to blend in with rocky terrain. While this item is equipped, this camouflage extends to you as well, granting you advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks made in mountainous or rocky terrain.

This item is camouflaged to blend in with forest terrain. While this item is equipped, this camouflage extends to you as well, granting you advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks made in forest or woodland terrain.

This item is camouflaged to blend in with snowy terrain. While this item is equipped, this camouflage extends to you as well, granting you advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks made in snowy, icy, or tundra terrain.

This item is camouflaged to blend in with coastal terrain. While this item is equipped, this camouflage extends to you as well, granting you advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks made in coastal or marine terrain.

This item is camouflaged to blend in with swampy terrain. While this item is equipped, this camouflage extends to you as well, granting you advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks made in swamp or marsh terrain.

This item is camouflaged to blend in with desert terrain. While this item is equipped, this camouflage extends to you as well, granting you advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks made in desert or wasteland terrain.

This item is camouflaged to blend in with grassland terrain. While this item is equipped, this camouflage extends to you as well, granting you advantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks made in grassland or plains terrain.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to resist or escape being grappled.
While this item is equipped, the amount of time you can hold your breath for is tripled.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to identify, grow, or interact with plants.
This item draws you in the direction of the nearest natural source of water within 10 miles.
While this item is equipped, you are able to see writing that has been obscured or made invisible.
This item cannot be removed from your possession against your will.
While this item is equipped, when you take damage from falling, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage from falling by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks or saving throws made to keep your balance.
As an action, you can change this item's appearance to that of another object of a similar size and shape. The change is illusory and does not stand up to physical inspection.
While this item is equipped, you can recall and retrace the exact path you've traveled for the last mile.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks or saving throws made to control or stay mounted upon a creature you are riding.
This item projects an illusory copy of itself, slightly obfuscating its actual position. Checks made to disarm or steal this item from its owner are made with disadvantage.
While this item is equipped, your walking speed increases by 5 ft.
While this item is equipped, this item is invisible.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about monstrosities.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about aberrations.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about beasts.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about celestials.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about constructs.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about dragons.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about elementals.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about fey.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about fiends.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about giants.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about humanoids.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about oozes.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about plants.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made to track or recall lore about undead.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using alchemist's supplies.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using brewer's supplies.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using calligrapher's supplies.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using carpenter's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using cartographer's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using cobbler's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using cook's utensils.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using a disguise kit.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using a forgery kit.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using glassblower's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using an herbalism kit.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using jeweler's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using leatherworker's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using mason's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using navigator's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using painter's supplies.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using a poisoner's kit.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using potter's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using smith's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using thieves' tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using tinker's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using weaver's tools.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made using woodcarver's tools.
While this item is equipped, you can comprehend written text no matter the language.
While this item is equipped, you can walk on water as if it was a solid surface.
This item is constantly radiating a dull warmth. While this item is equipped, you do not suffer the negative effects of temperatures as cold as -40 degrees Fahrenheit.
This item is always cold to the touch. While this item is equipped, you do not suffer the negative effects of temperatures as hot as 140 degrees Fahrenheit.
Once per day, you can turn this item into a snake. The snake obeys your commands and lasts for one hour. If the snake is killed it does not revert back to its original form and the item is destroyed.
While this item is equipped, the distance and height you can jump is doubled.
While this item is equipped, you can understand any spoken language.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Dexterity(Acrobatics) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Wisdom(Animal Handling) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Intelligence(Arcana) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Strength(Athletics) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Charisma(Deception) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Intelligence(History) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Wisdom(Insight) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Charisma(Intimidation) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Intelligence(Investigation) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Wisdom(Medicine) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Intelligence(Nature) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Wisdom(Perception) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Charisma(Performance) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Charisma(Persuasion) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Intelligence(Religion) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Dexterity(Sleight of Hand) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Dexterity(Stealth) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one Wisdom(Survival) check. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
Magical darkness emanates from this item out to a range of 10 ft. Covering or concealing the item blocks the darkness just as it would block light.
This item sheds dim green light for 5 ft. Any footprints or tracks made within the last 24 hours are illuminated by this light.

This item has cracks that glow the color of lava and is warm to the touch. This item radiates dim light out to a range of 5 ft. All creatures within 5 ft. of the item are unharmed by temperatures as low as -10 degrees Fahrenheit.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Survival) checks made to forage for food or water.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Strength(Athletics) checks made to climb.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom(Medicine) checks made to stabilize a dying creature.
As an action, you can use this item to create 1 gallon of freshwater. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
As an action, you can use this item to create one day's worth of food for one creature.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks or saving throws made to resist disease.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks or saving throws made to resist curses.
While this item is equipped, when you take poison damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the poison damage by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, when you take lightning damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the lightning damage by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, when you take acid damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the acid damage by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, when you take cold damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the cold damage by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, when you take fire damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the fire damage by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, when you take radiant damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the radiant damage by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, when you take necrotic damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the necrotic damage by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, when you take thunder damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the thunder damage by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, when you take force damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the force damage by 1d6.
While this item is equipped, when you take psychic damage, you can use your reaction to reduce the psychic damage by 1d6.

As an action, you can shift this item's appearance to look neglected (dented, cracked, rusted, etc.), normal (like an average item of its type), or luxurious (pristine, well made, fine materials, etc.). The item functions the same in each form.

As an action, you can stow or retrieve this item from an extradimensional space. You must be touching the item to stow it and only the person who stowed the item can retrieve it. When retrieving the item, it appears in your hand or in an empty space that you can see within 5 ft. of you.

While this item is equipped, when a creature you can see within 30 ft. rolls an attack, ability check, or saving throw, you can use your reaction to change the number rolled to a 20. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when a creature you can see within 30 ft. rolls an attack, ability check, or saving throw, you can use your reaction to change the number rolled to a 1. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, when a creature you can see within 30 ft. rolls an attack, ability check, or saving throw, you can use your reaction to change the number rolled to a 10. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on saves made to resist exhaustion or being put to sleep.

As an action, you can repeatedly fold this item, causing it to become a tiny replica of itself that can fit in the palm of your hand and weighing one pound. You can use an action to unfold this item to its original size, provided there is enough unoccupied space within 5 ft. of you to fit the full-sized item.

As an action, you can bribe this item into helping you. For every 5gp given to this item, you gain a +1 bonus on your next attack, ability check, or saving throw, up to a maximum of +5. Any currency given to this item is absorbed by it and is irretrievable.
While this item is equipped, you have a climbing speed of 20 ft.
While this item is equipped, you have a +1 bonus to all skill checks made between sunset and sunrise.

This item is constantly emanating badass heavy metal music. While this item is equipped, you can grant yourself advantage on one weapon attack per turn but you also have disadvantage on Dexterity(Stealth) checks.

This item bears the crest of an old noble house. While this item is equipped, people tend to view you as upper-class or wealthy. You have advantage on checks made to interact or blend in with nobility, royalty, or the exceptionally wealthy.

This item is sturdy and well-worn. While this item is equipped, people tend to view you as a member of the working class or a "salt of the earth" person. You have advantage on checks made to interact or blend in with blue collar or working class people.

This item has a little red button incorporated into its construction. Pressing the button causes the item to explode, destroying the item. Each creature within 20 ft. of the item must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d6 fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.
While this item is equipped, you can sense the true form of any shapeshifter you can see within 30 ft.

While this item is equipped, you can spend 1 minute examining a creature or object within 5 ft. of you. At the end of your examination you learn the nature of any curses affecting that creature or object as well as the type of the creature that bestowed each curse (if applicable).

While this item is equipped, you can use an action to create a 20 ft. aura of fog centered on the item. The fog follows the item for 1 minute before dispersing. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, you can choose to add your Wisdom modifier to an attack, check, or saving throw that you make. You must choose to do so before the roll. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, you can choose to add your Intelligence modifier to an attack, check, or saving throw that you make. You must choose to do so before the roll. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, you can choose to add your Charisma modifier to an attack, check, or saving throw that you make. You must choose to do so before the roll. This feature cannot be used again until the next dawn.

While this item is equipped, your sense of smell is heightened, granting you advantage on Wisdom(Perception) checks that rely on smell. You can also use an action to sniff a creature within 10 ft. of you, learning the creature's type as a result.
While this item is equipped, you have advantage on opportunity attack rolls.

While this item is equipped, when you fall at least 10 ft., you cause the ground to crater around you. Each creature other than you within 20 ft. of the point where you landed must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 1d6 of bludgeoning damage for every 10 ft. you fell on a failure, or half as much damage on a success.

This item was created by a powerful druid and is infused with some of their power. While this item is equipped, you know one cantrip of the DM's choice from the druid's spell list and can cast it at will. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

This item was created by a powerful cleric and is infused with some of their power. While this item is equipped, you know one cantrip of the DM's choice from the cleric's spell list and can cast it at will. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

This item was created by a powerful wizard and is infused with some of their power. While this item is equipped, you know one cantrip of the DM's choice from the wizard's spell list and can cast it at will. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

This item was created by a powerful bard and is infused with some of their power. While this item is equipped, you know one cantrip of the DM's choice from the bard's spell list and can cast it at will. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

This item was created by a powerful sorcerer and is infused with some of their power. While this item is equipped, you know one cantrip of the DM's choice from the sorcerer's spell list and can cast it at will. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

This item was created by a powerful warlock and is infused with some of their power. While this item is equipped, you know one cantrip of the DM's choice from the warlock's spell list and can cast it at will. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

This item was created by a powerful artificer and is infused with some of their power. While this item is equipped, you know one cantrip of the DM's choice from the artificer's spell list and can cast it at will. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for this spell.
This item glows faintly, shedding dim light for 5 ft.
While this item is equipped, your teeth, eyes, and ears take on slightly more beast-like qualities.
This item always has a thin layer of frost coating it. While this item is equipped, you can walk on top of snow and ice without falling through.
While this item is equipped, you always know which way is north.
While this item is equipped, you can change the color of your eyes at will.
While this item is equipped, you can change the color and style of your hair and makeup at will.
While this item is equipped, you can understand and be understood by snakes and serpents.
This item floats on water and other liquids.
While this item is equipped, an illusory beard appears on your face. You can change the style and color of the beard each dawn.
While this item is equipped, you can perfectly mimic the call of any bird you've heard before.

While this item is equipped, you know the location of any fungi within 60 feet of you. Additionally, when you remain in one place for longer than an hour, small, harmless mushrooms begin to grow on and around you.
Creatures that sleep within 5 ft. of this item cannot have nightmares.
Creatures that sleep within 5 ft. of this item do not dream at all.
When exposed to moonlight, this item sheds bright light in a 10 ft. radius and dim light for an additional 10 ft.
As an action, you can use this item to kindle a small fire or light a torch.
This item has a light magnetic field causing it to stick to nearby ferrous metals such as iron or steel.
While this item is equipped, your shadow is cast towards the sun instead of away from it.
This item always smells faintly of wild flowers. While this item is equipped, any nearby bees are drawn to you. The bees are not hostile towards you.
While this item is equipped, you can change its color at will.
Nearby spiders are drawn to you While this item is equipped. The spiders are not hostile towards you.
This item smells of wildflowers and, while equipped, small flowers and plants grow wherever you step.
A light fog constantly swirls around your feet While this item is equipped.
A faint ticking sound can be heard emanating from this item.
The faint sounds of ethereal singing can be heard emanating from this item.
This item is always covered in barnacles and dripping salt water.
Bits of dust and rock are constantly falling from this item.
While this item is equipped, your hair and clothing move as if blown by a soft breeze. You are also surrounded by the faint smell of the ocean.
This item is lighter than expected. While not being worn or carried this item will hover about 3 feet off the ground. It cannot support any weight beyond its own.
While this item is equipped, nearby rats and mice are drawn to you. The rats and mice are not hostile towards your or anyone near you.
While not being worn or carried this item will move at a rate of 5 ft. per hour. It always moves in the same direction.
This item has a singular eye painted or carved onto its surface. The eye seems to follow the nearest creature it can see.
Harmless streaks of electric energy occasionally dance across this item.
Although solid to the touch, this item is slightly transparent, as though not fully a part of this plane of existence.
While this item is equipped, your eyes glow with a bright, white light and your voice sounds as though there is another entity speaking through you.
While this item is equipped, your clothes constantly billow as if by a firm breeze.
This item is made from mismatched spare parts salvaged from many other items. It is quite sturdy despite its ramshackle appearance.
While at rest, this item's appearance changes to perfectly mimic its surroundings.
This item weighs twice as much as a normal item of its type and size.
This item weighs half as much as a normal item of its type and size.
This item is made of solid, beautiful stained glass. Despite its glass construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made from steel.
This item is made entirely of wood and vines. It looks more like it was grown rather than constructed. Despite its organic construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made from steel.
This item is made entirely from clear crystals. Despite its crystalline construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made from steel.
This item is made entirely from various animal bones. Despite its strange construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made from steel.
This item made entirely of ice. The ice is cool to the touch and does not melt. Despite its strange construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made from steel.
This item is constantly wreathed in harmless, illusory flames.
This item is always warm to the touch and smells faintly of sulfur. While this item is equipped, harmless smoke constantly rises from it.
This item is made from the hard shell or exoskeleton of some kind of creature. Despite its chitinous construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made from steel.
This item is badly burned as if it survived a horrible fire. All attempts to repair it fail. Despite its charred, damaged appearance, the item is functional and strong, as if made from steel.
This item is as black as the night sky and, every once in a while, a shooting star will streak across its surface.
This item glows faintly, shedding dim light for 5 ft., but only when there are no other light sources available.
This item was created by a powerful aberration and was infused with some of its power. When this item is viewed from the corner of the eye, it appears to be moving in strange, unnatural ways.
Each dawn a new, unfamiliar constellation appears carved into this item.
While this item is equipped, you feel confident in yourself and your abilities.
While this item is equipped, you feel optimistic about what the future may hold.
While this item is equipped, curses, swear words, and insults that you say can be understood by anyone who can hear you, provided that they understand at least one language.

This item has Elven script carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you know several curses and insults from the elven language and can say them as if you were fluent in that language.

This item has Orcish writing carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you know several curses and insults from the orcish language and can say them as if you were fluent in that language.

This item has Dwarven runes carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you know several curses and insults from the dwarven language and can say them as if you were fluent in that language.

This item has Gnomish writing carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you know several curses and insults from the gnomish language and can say them as if you were fluent in that language.

This item has Halfling script carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you know several curses and insults from the halfling language and can say them as if you were fluent in that language.

This item has Giant runes carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you know several curses and insults from the giant language and can say them as if you were fluent in that language.

This item has Goblin writing carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you know several curses and insults from the goblin language and can say them as if you were fluent in that language.
While this item is equipped, you feel friendly and talkative.
When this item is left on a flat surface, it slowly turns until it is pointing north.
Beetles and other insects are drawn to this item. The insects are not hostile.
Ants are drawn to this item. The ants are not hostile.
While this item is equipped, you can consume even the spiciest food without adverse issues.
Fish and other marine animals are drawn to this item.
While this item is equipped, when you open a door, a dramatic wind blows past you through the doorway.
While this item is equipped, you always smell faintly of sandalwood and vanilla.
This item never gets dirty.
This item has 1d10 notches carved into it when you find it. While this item is equipped, each time you kill a creature using an attack or spell, another notch magically appears on the item.
While this item is equipped, this item changes color based on your mood. For example, it may turn red when you're angry, blue when you're sad, green when you're happy, and so on.

This item is constructed in a way that seems to defy physics or creates some kind of optical illusion when looking at it. Despite its strange construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made from steel.
This item seems to be made of folded paper. Despite its strange construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made from iron.
This item has a clear gem embedded in it. While this item is equipped, the gem changes color to match your eyes.
This item is broken into several pieces that are held together via an invisible force. Despite its strange construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made of steel.

When this item is found, roll a d100. The number rolled is carved or inscribed somewhere on this item. Each dawn, the number is reduced by 1. Your GM determines what happens when the countdown reaches 0.
When used, this item emits exaggerated sound effects causing everything it does to sound more dramatic and exciting.
This item has several eyes carved or inscribed upon it. Each eye follows nearby creatures and blinks occasionally.
This item is made from an alarming number of teeth. Despite its strange construction, the item is functional and strong, as if made from steel.

This item was created by a powerful celestial and was infused with some of its power. This item is half the normal weight and inscribed with feathered wings, suns, and other symbols of good. Fiends find the item’s presence repulsive.

This item was created by a powerful drow and is infused with some of their power. This item is half the normal weight and is inscribed with spiders and webs. It seems to recoil when exposed to sunlight.
This item was created by a powerful dwarf and is infused with some of their power. This item is durable and has Dwarven runes worked into its design. It hums quietly when underground.

This item was created by a powerful elf and is infused with some of their power. This item is half the normal weight and is adorned with leaves, vines, and other symbols of nature. It glows faintly when in old forests.

This item was created by a powerful fae being and is infused with some of their power. This item is exquisitely crafted from the finest materials and glows with a pale radiance in moonlight, shedding dim light in a 5-foot radius.

This item was created by a powerful fiend and is infused with some of its power. This item is made of black iron or horn inscribed with runes, and any cloth or leather components are crafted from the hide of fiends. It is warm to the touch and celestials find the item’s presence repulsive.

This item was created by a powerful giant and is infused with some of its power. This item is slightly larger than normal and has giant runes carved or inscribed upon it. While this item is equipped, you appear slightly taller than you actually are.

This item was created by a powerful undead and is infused with some of its power. This item incorporates imagery of death, such as bones and skulls, and it might be crafted from parts of corpses. It feels cold to the touch.

This item has a secret message inscribed upon it that is only visible in moonlight. Your GM can choose one of the following messages or create their own: "The lake. Full moon. Join us.", "The Silver Queen shall rise again!", "Present this coupon for 1 free ride."
This item was created by a neutral-evil lich to be used as their phylactery. However, a dark ritual went awry and a portion of the lich's soul was trapped within the item and is desperate to escape.

This item has the symbol of a lawful-good order of knights carved or inscribed upon it. The soul of one of the orders most prestigious knights still resides within the item, lending their wisdom and advice to its new owner. The knight does not look favorably upon acts of evil.
This item was used to bind the soul of a chaotic-evil demon that could not be permanently killed. The demon encourages the item's new owner to pursue violence whenever the opportunity arises.

This item was created by mind flayers and still retains a faint link to the hive mind from whence it came. The item speaks telepathically and sounds as though a thousand voices are speaking in unison. It desperately seeks to be reunited with its hive mind, or to create a new one...

This item contains the soul of a powerful wizard's neutral-good apprentice who accidentally trapped themselves when a spell went wrong. While this item is equipped, when making an Intelligence(Arcana) check, you can use the apprentice's bonus (+5) instead of your own.

This item is simple and unadorned. It contains the soul of an lawful-good monk that wishes to guide others to spiritual enlightenment. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

This item once belonged to a lawful-good knight of the utmost virtue whose spirit is still trapped within. The knight seems surprisingly ok with this and is content to aid the item's owner in noble quests to rescue damsels, defeat scoundrels, and other such chivalrous pursuits.

The original owner of this item died before they could complete an important quest. Only when their unfinished business is complete will their spirit be able to finally rest - a fact that they bring up often. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made in pursuit of this item's goal.

This item contains the soul of a warrior that sought fame and glory but never achieved it. Now, they encourage the item's owner to seek fame and glory so that they may be known as the greatest magic item in all the land.

This item contains the soul of a scholar that sought to unravel the mysteries of the universe but died before their work was finished. They encourage the item's new owner to seek knowledge and lore, and may even be willing to share some of their own knowledge in exchange.

This item bears an unfamiliar maker's mark and does not know how it came to be sentient. The item seeks its maker and wants to understand why it was created. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on checks made in pursuit of this item's goal.

This item is well worn and has a family crest carved or inscribed upon it. Several deceased members of the same family all communicate with the item's owner, giving unsolicited and often conflicting pieces of "wisdom."
This item contains the soul of a person that was cursed by a witch or warlock. They desperately seek your help to end this curse so that their soul may finally be at rest.

This item is sentient and takes immense pride in performing its designated function, regardless of how mundane it may be. This item has no respect for those who shirk their duties or responsibilities.

This item glows faintly and contains an imprisoned lawful-good celestial. The celestial desperately seeks to be free of its imprisonment, but will not tolerate any acts of evil from its bearer. The magic properties of this item will not work for someone with an evil alignment.
This item was originally a sentient diamond but was transformed into its current form by a powerful fae. It views its current form with disdain and seeks desperately to be returned to its true self.

This item has the symbol of a deity carved or inscribed upon it. The item itself is a devout follower of that deity and does its best to convert as many people as it can into worshipers of its god. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Intelligence(Religion) checks made regarding this item's deity.

This item speaks in a ponderous, meandering manner with a voice like an elderly librarian. The item knows a great deal of information on many subjects, but getting information out of it is a slow, arduous process.

This item bears the mark of a god of trickery. This chaotic item delights in deceiving its wielder and those around it, especially in ways that could lead them to harm. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on Charisma(Deception) checks.
This item is extremely lazy and distains being used. It complains when made to do even the lightest of tasks.
This item is a hopeless romantic at heart, delighting in tales of romance or displays of affection. The item takes it as its sole mission in life to find its wielder a good partner.

This item is full of optimism and positivity. It is an excellent listener and does its best to make its wielder feel good about themselves. While this item is equipped, you have advantage on saves made to resist being frightened.
This item is pessimistic and negative. It critiques its wielder's every move and never has anything positive to say.

A powerful creature from the Feywild is trapped within this item. Although they desire freedom from this prison, they desire an end to the boredom of being trapped in an item more. It is glad to aid its wielder so long as they provide the item with sufficient amusement.
This item is extremely lazy and disdains being used. It complains when made to do even the lightest of tasks.
